column2: Ulcerated tumor on the left side of face weighing down mouse, pulsating body, able to still be alert
DCT-TVA; Braf; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, primary tumor
Skull intact. Lungs had some small nodes upon visual inspection. Heavy tumor on left side of face. Extremely ulcerated. 2 tumor chunks froze down, 1 cell line started.
